Pre-Game Insights: The Pistons are 7-point underdogs against the Lakers with odds of $1.91 available at Bet365.
The Lakers are predicted to win 116-109 based on 10,000 game simulations.
Cade Cunningham is projected to score 27 points, 5 rebounds, and 9 assists for the Pistons.
Anthony Davis is projected to finish with 29 points, 13 rebounds, and 5 assists for the Lakers.
Others: The game is scheduled to commence at 11:30am AEDT on Tuesday, November 5, 2024, at Little Caesars Arena.
